title: MAGIC PINK CAPSULE / MPC
lyrics:
[Chorus]
Pop open this, this magic pink capsule
I'm in Heaven, just throw me one, I'm full
I haven't slept, I never eat, I'm full
Eyes wide open, I can not sleep, I'm dull
Pop open this, this magic pink capsule
I'm in Heaven, just throw me one, I'm full
I haven't slept, I never eat, I'm full
Eyes wide open, I can not sleep, I'm dull
Pop open this, this magic pink capsule
I'm in Heaven, just throw me one, I'm full
I haven't slept, I never eat, I'm full
Eyes wide open, I can not sleep, I'm dull
Pop open this, this magic pink capsule
I'm in Heaven, just throw me one, I'm full
I haven't slept, I never eat, I'm full
Eyes wide open, I can not sleep, I'm dull
[Verse 1]
This will make you feel better
This will make you feel better
This could be the antidote or gateway drug
Either way, baby, you know it's temporary fun
And you don't have to sip none from the cup
Lick it up, tender, tender, tender to the touch
(She still frequent fender benders, now she slender in the butt)
Chop it up more, baby, chop it up

[Chorus]
(Pop open this, magic pink capsule)
(I'm in Heaven, just throw me one, I'm full)
(I haven't slept, I never eat, I'm full)
(Eyes wide open, I can not sleep, I'm dull)
(Pop open this, magic pink capsule)
(I'm in Heaven, just throw me one, I'm full)
(I haven't slept, I never eat, I'm full)
(Eyes wide open, I can not sleep, I'm dull)
Pop open this, magic pink capsule
I'm in Heaven, just throw me one, I'm full
I haven't slept, I never eat, I'm full
Eyes wide open, I can not sleep, I'm dull
Pop open this, this magic pink capsule
I'm in Heaven, just throw me one, I'm full
I haven't slept, I never eat, I'm full
Eyes wide open, I can not sleep, I'm dull
[Outro]
Oh-oh-oh
Du-du-du-du-du-du
Yuh, ay
Ay
Ay
